titles.title: Christ on the Cross between the Virgin and St John

historicEventInformations.remarks: Missale s[e]c[un]d[u]m rubrica[m] eccle||sie Brandenburgensis (Jncipit ordo missalis s'm || consuetudin? ecclesie Brande=||burgensis ... ||) [Hrsg.v.(Diocesis Brã||denburgensis Episcopus Hie=||ronymus ... ||)], Leipzig, M. Lotter, 1516 [VD16 M 5561]
Missale secundum ritum sct ecclesie pragensis in Bohemia adiectis oibus sacri faciendi carminibus perfesta annua. missale, prag, Leipzig, Melchior  Lotter, 1522 [VD16 M5616]

pageContext.description:
Christ on the cross, between the Virgin and St John; Adam's skull and bones lie in the foreground, in the distance a city is seen.

unclear whether it was first used in the Missale pragense: Missale integrum tam de tempore quam de sanctis secundum rubricam archiepiscopatus ecclessie Pragensis. Nuremberg: Georg Stuchs, 1508 

the Brandenburg Missal, Leipzig 1516 
the Missale Pragense, Leipzig, 1522

Some impressions lettered with winged serpent at lower margin centre-right.
pageContext.inscription: in the block cross titled IRNI (R and N in reverse).
